readme_content:
--- ## **About Me** - 🔭 **Currently working on:** Cloud, Backend, and AI projects! - 🌱 **Learning:** Advanced **Docker CI/CD**, **Vector DBs**, and **GitHub Actions** - Check out my [portfolio](https://aswin.radr.in)! or [devb.io](https://devb.io/aswinpradeepc)
![Profile view counter](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=aswinpradeepc) --- ## 🛠 **Tech Stack**

--- ## 🛠️ Projects | **Project** | **Description** | **Technologies Used** | |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | [**LinkRadr**](https://github.com/aswinpradeepc/linkradr) |[Live: link.radr.in](https://link.radr.in) A scalable **URL shortener** with features like **custom short links** and **OTP-based authentication**. aswinpradeepc/aswinpradeepc.summary: Recent activities on this repository have focused on updating the README.md. Multiple push events (5 times) have been observed, demonstrating continuous effort to refine and maintain the documentation.

aswinpradeepc/llmsearch.summary: Significant contributions have been made to the llmsearch repository, including pushing updates to reflect Dockerization ('dockerise') and milestone completion ('version0 done' and 'somewhat working'). Initial prototypes were also pushed on '2025-02-11'

aswinpradeepc/website.summary: Recent activities have centered around updates to the website repository. Specifically, there have been updates to the CNAME (2 instances), resumes (3 instances), and existing files via upload. This highlights efforts to maintain and enhance the website's content and structure.

aswinpradeepc/instagram.summary: There have been recent push events on the instagram repository, primarily involving file uploads and updates. These changes include adding files via upload and updating the index.html. These activities suggest ongoing efforts to optimize and refine the repository.

aswinpradeepc/devb.io.summary: This repository has seen substantial updates, including implementing scroll synchronization between left and right sections on user profiles, working on a poster feature, release, and sharing debugging experiences. Refinements and complete optimizations have been carried out.

profile_summary:
Here's a short, engaging summary:

Highly motivated and detail-driven Backend Engineer with expertise in cloud, machine learning, and software development. As a seasoned professional and CSE Student at CUSAT, I've honed my skills in leading-edge technologies including Python, C++, and TypeScript. With a strong foundation in Linux and a proven track record of successfully delivering scalable and maintainable solutions, I'm well-equipped to drive technical innovation and solve complex problems.
